column5: Anyone missing fishing in northwest Ontario this year? After a five year break spent mostly looking after elderly parents and inlaws I am back fishing again and making some videos of my days on the Winnipeg River between Kenora and Minaki. I, like most of my equipment, am 5 years older now as evidenced by my white covid beard but the fishing is still pretty good! If you need your Canada fishing fix have a look at https://www.youtube.com/c/Nwofishing/videos
Thank you for posting some videos. Sometimes, it is rewarding to watch fellas like myself just enjoying themselves. Happy that you are able to return to activities that you were missing.
I watched several of your videos , i really enjoyed them , pretty country . I noticed that the bottom bouncer you are using looks pretty big , at least a one ounce perhaps ?
Not to highjack the thread but gosh, a 1oz looks pretty big? That's almost the lightest in my arsenal.
I am using a three oz weight. You need it for the depth plus current in the main channel areas. Could get away with 2 oz if you had to and if you kept a slow speed.
